{{Location Intro|description=<p>The Hills of Barsom are located just north of [[Asipattravana Swamp]]. They are home to the Barsom, a huge pine tree with pink foliage,<ref>{{Ref/VP|Elder Pine Atop the Wastes}}</ref> and its familiar, the Pari [[Rashnu]].</p>}}

According to their records, the [[Order of Skeptics]] historically held a musical ritual involving [[Korybantes]] around the Barsom, which they believed was a crucial component of forming a bond ("Laupa") with the [[Pari]].<ref>{{Ref/Loading|Sumeru|Korybantes}}</ref> In reality, Rashnu apparently found this ritual too noisy.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Awakening's Real Sound}}</ref>

=== Etymology===
*In Zoroastrianism, the {{w|Barsom}} is a ritual implement used by Zoroastrian priests to solemnize certain sacred ceremonies.
